user_query: Show me sales in Mumbai for last month

intent.rationale: Clear request for sales data with specific location and time period. Single intent to retrieve data.
intent.generated_sql: SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE (city LIKE '%Mumbai%' OR location LIKE '%Mumbai%') AND MONTH(date) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) LIMIT 100;

intent.rationale: Explicit comparison request between two time periods for complaint data. Comparative intent is clear.
intent.generated_sql: SELECT YEAR(date) as year, COUNT(*) as total_complaints FROM complaints WHERE YEAR(date) IN (2024, 2025) GROUP BY YEAR(date) LIMIT 100;

user_query: What's the average response time for support tickets in Q3 2024?

intent.rationale: Request for analytical metric (average) over specific time period. Analysis intent with aggregation.
intent.generated_sql: SELECT AVG(response_time) as avg_response_time FROM support_tickets WHERE YEAR(date) = 2024 AND QUARTER(date) = 3 LIMIT 100;

user_query: Update the customer status to active for all customers with pending orders

intent.rationale: Clear update operation to modify customer status based on order condition. Modification intent.

user_query: Show me the top 10 products by revenue in December 2024 and compare with November

intent.rationale: Complex query with both ranking (top 10) and comparison elements. Compare intent with multiple entities.
intent.generated_sql: SELECT product_name, MONTH(date) as month, SUM(revenue) as total_revenue FROM sales_transactions WHERE (MONTH(date) = 12 AND YEAR(date) = 2024) OR (MONTH(date) = 11 AND YEAR(date) = 2024) GROUP BY product_name, MONTH(date) ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 10;

user_query: Predict sales for next quarter based on current trends

intent.rationale: Explicit prediction request with time period and method specification. Predictive intent.

user_query: Summarize employee performance ratings by department for this year

intent.rationale: Clear summarization request with grouping by department and time period. Aggregation intent.
intent.generated_sql: SELECT department, AVG(performance_rating) as avg_rating, COUNT(*) as employee_count FROM performance_reviews WHERE YEAR(review_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY department LIMIT 100;

intent.rationale: User requests sales data for April. Since no year is specified, only filter by month.
intent.generated_sql: SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE MONTH(date) = 4 LIMIT 100;

intent.rationale: User requests orders with amount greater than 5000. Numeric filter applied.
intent.generated_sql: SELECT * FROM sales_orders WHERE total_amount > 5000 LIMIT 100;

intent.rationale: User requests customers from Mumbai. Location filter applied using LIKE for flexibility.
intent.generated_sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city LIKE '%Mumbai%' OR location LIKE '%Mumbai%' LIMIT 100;

user_query: show revenue between January and March

intent.rationale: User requests revenue data for date range between January and March. Assuming current year if not specified.
intent.generated_sql: SELECT * FROM sales_revenue WHERE MONTH(date) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) LIMIT 100;
